page.title: 11THE WORKING DAY OF A MINER
page.content: My father works at Penrhiwceiber colliery.He works on three different shifts,mornings afternoons and nights. When he is mornings,he gets up about 4.45 and has a cooked breakfast.He then goes down the road to catch the works bus or sometimes he has a lift with his mate. He 'clocks in' and gets his equipment and goes down in the cage to the coal face.My father works on the coal cutting machine and it is very hot, noisy,dirty work. At the end of the shift he returns to the surface and goes to the shower room to wash all the dirt and dust off.He then changes into his day clothes and catches the bus back home, and spends the afternoon having a nap or takes the dog for a walk.
